title: vandhadhellam varaTTam
sahitya:
vandadellaam varaTTum anda

kandan krupai maTTum irukkaTTum

(vanda)



anupallavi



manda manadu bhava vinaiyiluzhanRu

enda vELaiyilum varunda ceyyaTTumanRi

(vanda)



caraNam



ulagamellaam nammai pazhikkaTTum gana

oozhvinaiyaal tuyar sezhikkaTum

pala kavalaigaLODu sila nimisham murugan

paramakrupaiyai ninaindurugi bajanai seyvOm

(vanda)
